captions: this image represents a 2D section of a divergent bedform geometry.
this image represents a seismic section. It is a fanning reflection geometry.
a 2D seismic model with a spreading stratigraphic unit.
this image represents a seismic section with differentially dipping reflectors.
we see here a 2D subsurface model of a thickening wedge pattern.
label: divergent
